Description: Tool suite to automatically extract, store and visualize mass spectrometer instrument parameters from raw data files, particularly for Thermo instruments
Key Features: Extracts instrument parameters; Monitors hardware performance; Database storage

Description: Interoperable open-source R/Bioconductor package for calculation of standardized quality metrics, agnostic to underlying technology (proteomics, metabolomics, lipidomics)
Key Features: Multi-omics support; Standardized metrics; Low memory footprint; Multiple input formats

Description: R/Bioconductor package for longitudinal system suitability monitoring and quality control, initially for targeted SRM/MRM experiments, extended to DDA and DIA
Key Features: Statistical process control; Control charts; Longitudinal monitoring; Change point analysis

Description: Omics-agnostic automated quality control software for mass spectrometry data, supporting proteomics, metabolomics, and lipidomics with ion mobility spectrometry
Key Features: Automated outlier detection; Ion mobility support; Machine learning-based; Multi-omics

Description: R package for quality control, exploratory data analysis, and statistical analysis of MS data, robust to missing data for proteomics, metabolomics, and lipidomics
Key Features: Missing data handling; Statistical analysis; Filtering and normalization; Multi-omics

Description: R-based QC pipeline for bottom-up LC-MS data from MaxQuant, creates comprehensive QC reports with automated scoring and heatmap visualizations
Key Features: MaxQuant integration; Automated scoring; Comprehensive reports; Heat map visualization

Description: Real-time and retrospective quality control monitoring software for untargeted metabolomics data with web dashboard interface
Key Features: Real-time monitoring; User-defined compounds; Contaminant tracking; Web dashboard

Description: OpenMS utility that calculates basic quality parameters from mass spectrometry runs and subsequent analysis data
Key Features: Basic QC metrics; qcML export; OpenMS integration

Description: Tool for DIA-PASEF data quality control from Bruker timsTOF instruments
Key Features: timsTOF specific; DIA-PASEF support

Description: Python package for automated QC analysis across proteomics workflow, particularly for large-scale DIA experiments
Key Features: DIA-focused; Batch visualization; Interactive plots

Description: Cloud-based quality control system for automatic data collection, processing, and longitudinal instrument evaluation with web interface
Key Features: Cloud-based; Multi-instrument support; Automated processing; Web interface

Description: Multivendor performance metrics tool for LC-MS/MS proteomics, provides ID-based and ID-free quality metrics
Key Features: Multivendor support; ID-based and ID-free metrics; Widely cited reference tool

Description: Automated interactive dashboard for real-time assessment of LC-MS/MS data quality using internal, external, and reference standards
Key Features: Real-time dashboard; Multiple standard types; Interactive visualizations

Description: Server-based software suite for monitoring LC-MS performance metrics on Orbitrap instruments with web-based visualization
Key Features: Orbitrap-specific; Web visualization; Automated uploads; Longitudinal tracking

Description: SWATH-QC metrics tool for monitoring data-independent acquisition (DIA/SWATH) data quality, focusing on peptide-level quality control metrics
Key Features: Fast forward-only XML parsing; mzQC serialization; Transition library deserialization (Thermo, Skyline, TraML); SwaMe and Prognosticator metric libraries

Description: Real-time quality control assessment tool for MS-based proteomics data to dynamically flag instrument or sample quality issues
Key Features: Real-time flagging; Machine learning; Drift detection

Description: LC-MS proteomics monitoring software from Biognosys that generates real-time quality control readouts with iRT peptides
Key Features: iRT peptides; Commercial support; Integration with Biognosys products

Description: Quality control tool integrated in quantms pipeline for DDA and DIA proteomics experiments
Key Features: Nextflow integration; Multi-platform

Description: Web-based software for long-term storage and visualization of extensive performance metrics based on NIST standards
Key Features: NIST metrics; Web interface; Long-term storage; Outlier detection

Description: Tool for rapid visual HTML-based QC reports focused on monitoring LC-MS system performance within experiments
Key Features: Rapid HTML reports; Raw data focus; Visual QC

Description: Cloud-based quality control system for mass spectrometry with automated data processing and mzQC export
Key Features: Cloud-based; mzQC in development; Automated processing

Description: Open, community-curated web platform for benchmarking and quality control of proteomics data analysis workflows with multiple modules for DDA/DIA quantification
Key Features: Community-driven benchmarking; Multiple modules; Public results repository; Multispecies support; Workflow comparison

Description: R-based benchmark analysis software for validation and performance evaluation of LC-MS/MS workflows using hybrid proteome samples
Key Features: Multispecies benchmarking; Summary statistics; Detects quantification errors; Workflow comparison

Description: R package computational benchmarking framework for label-free quantitative proteomics using hybrid proteome samples to calculate precision and accuracy metrics
Key Features: Precision and accuracy metrics; Hybrid proteome analysis; Multi-tool comparison; Benchmark framework; ROC curves

Description: Automated quality control system integrated with Skyline and PanoramaWeb for longitudinal instrument performance monitoring.
Key Features: Vendor-neutral; Multiple acquisition techniques support; Multi-instrument tracking; Automated Skyline and Panorama integration; Statistical process control; Web browser access

Description: Comprehensive QC system for large-scale urinary proteomics data with 81 metrics for individual experiment and cohort quality evaluation
Key Features: 81 QC metrics; Integrates metrics from NIST, QuaMeter, DO-MS, RawBeans and others; Intra- and inter-experiment evaluation; Multi-platform comparison

Description: AI-empowered DIA-based quality control tool with machine learning models for automated LC and MS system evaluation
Key Features: AI/ML-based QC; 15 DIA metrics; timsTOF, TripleTOF and Orbitrap support; Automated LC/MS performance prediction; DIA-NN integration; Notification system; HTML longitudinal reports

Description: Statistical Process Control in Proteomics tool integrated into Skyline for monitoring QC metrics with control charts and Pareto analysis
Key Features: Statistical process control charts; Five ID-free metrics; Skyline integration; Real-time monitoring; Multi-peptide tracking; Vendor-neutral dashboard

Description: Data-driven Optimization of MS methods tool for interactive visualization and optimization of DDA/DIA data
Key Features: Interactive GUI; MaxQuant and DIA-NN support; Bottleneck diagnosis; Parameter optimization; Single-cell and plexDIA support; Modular and extensible

Description: Proteomics Assay COMparator - Java tool for importing, comparing, and visualizing multiple proteomics experiments for data integrity and quality verification
Key Features: Multi-dataset comparison; Data integration; Rich graphical representations; MIAPE/HUPO-PSI compliant; Multiple search engine support; Java standalone

Description: R/Bioconductor package for analyzing quality and reproducibility of MaxQuant proteomics data with comprehensive PDF reports
Key Features: MaxQuant-specific; PDF report generation; iRT peptide tracking; Contamination analysis; Reproducibility assessment; Easy single-function workflow; Bioconductor package

Description: R/Bioconductor package providing integrated pipeline for MS-based proteomics QC with HTML reports using X!Tandem search
Key Features: HTML report generation; X!Tandem integration; iTRAQ/TMT labeling efficiency; Mass accuracy summaries; Separation efficiency plots; Raw-to-report pipeline; Bioconductor package

Description: Windows application with R backend for comprehensive downstream data analysis including normalization, statistics, clustering, and visualization
Key Features: Comprehensive statistical analysis; Diagnostic plots; Multiple normalization methods; ANOVA and clustering; Heatmaps; Peptide-to-protein rollup
